string.value: Romeo's Love Letter

Romeo is an alchemist from Magatia. I don't know about his alchemy skills, but his dating skills leave a lot to be desired, and he seems to be really concerned about that as well. I'll need to talk to #bRomeo#k.
Romeo wanted to write a love letter to Juliet that conveyed his true feelings towards her, but he seemed to be struggling with words. I'll have to come up with something very creative for Romeo...
Struggling, but slowly making progress with the letter, Romeo sure is trying to impress Juliet. I wonder how the letter will end up.

Hello, traveler. Sigh... I am just beginning to realize that there's actually something out there that's much more difficult to figure out than alchemy... and that's dating. I had no idea dating would be this difficult.\r\n#b#L0# (I knew he couldn't wear the clothes that Juliet gave him!)#l

I am so glad to have received a gift from Juliet, and I need to properly express how thankful I am for her gesture... and it's driving me nuts. I already gave her the flower, so I wanted to try something new... by writing a letter, and...\r\n#b#L0# (I can't believe he's worried about something other than the clothes.)#l
I really have no idea what to write on that letter. Have you... ever written a #blove letter#k before? If you have, then PLEASE help me write one just this one time!
Wow...! Thank you so much! Okay, please wait for a second. I made a list of beautiful words that I found on the dictionary that perfectly describes Juliet.
Eh...? You have never written a love letter, either? Really... wow, I guess we're both on the same boat!

Alright, we'll start making phrases based on beautiful words that'll go along with Juliet. Please select the words that go accordingly. 
#b#L0#Juliet, precious and beautiful #l 
#b#L1#Juliet, beautiful like a gorilla#l 
#b#L2#Juliet, beautiful like a donkey#l 
#b#L3#Juliet, beautiful like a potato#l

Moving on to the next sentence! Please take a good look at these phrases, and select the one that'll fit this letter. 
#b#L0#Looking at your Roid-like eyes #l 
#b#L1#Looking at your Maed-like eyes#l 
#b#L2#Looking at your starry eyes#l 
#b#L3#Looking at your laser sharp eyes#l

Moving on to the next sentence! Please take a good look at these phrases, and select the one that'll fit this letter. 
#b#L0#bot my heart pounding like a wave of ocean. #l 
#b#L1#bot me craving sushi.#l 
#b#L2#bot me wanting to study alchemy with you.#l 
#b#L3#bot me backtracking in fear.#l

Moving on to the next sentence! Please take a good look at these phrases, and select the one that'll fit this letter. 
#b#L0#Like a furious flurry of tornado in Ariant#l 
#b#L1#Like a rough-and tumble Jr. Balrog #l 
#b#L2#Like the two rats hiding in sand#l 
#b#L3#Bonding together like Yeti and Pepe#l

Moving on to the next sentence! Please take a good look at these phrases, and select the one that'll fit this letter. 
#b#L0#I'd like to spend the rest of my life playing mini games with you.#l 
#b#L1#I'd like to spend the rest of my life hunting with you.#l 
#b#L2#I'd like to spend the rest of my life being there for you.#l 
#b#L3#I'd like to spend the rest of my life dealing mesos with you.#l
Okay, I think we're down to the last sentence. What's the last sentence? Well... isn't it obvious?#bJuliet, I love you.#k
I knew you're different from the rest, traveler. This is beautiful... thank you so much. I hope Juliet really likes this.
